name: nanoblocktech/luminova-framework
description: PHP Luminova framework design for speed

suggest.ext-curl: Needed if you use CURLRequest class
suggest.ext-exif: Needed if you run Image class tests
suggest.ext-fileinfo: Needed to improves mime type detection for files
suggest.ext-gd: Needed if you use Image class GDHandler
suggest.ext-imagick: Needed if you use Image class ImageMagickHandler
suggest.ext-memcache: Needed if you use Cache class MemcachedHandler with Memcache
suggest.ext-memcached: Needed if you use Cache class MemcachedHandler with Memcached
